seo.title: Translation of your video from Spanish into English in the Vidby service
seo.description: Online dubbing from Spanish into English and from English into Spanish for your video in the Vidby service using our modern and high quality algorithms.

content:
Translation and Dub from Spanish to English

In our contemporary world, many people are struggling with the problem of sharing information in the global arena. One of the proven ways to share your thoughts, ideas, and messages is through videos. So, the issue of the problem lies in the inability to translate into many different languages. VidBy has tried to remove the language barrier and wanted that videos can be easily and quickly translated, especially when we are talking about a complicated language pair of Spanish-English and how to translate a video from Spanish to English or vice versa.

The popularity and specification of the language pair

Spanish is the language spoken by over 500 million people around the globe, and it is evident that there is a need to translate videos from Spanish to English or to make it in the opposite side - English to Spanish. However, it is not that easy to do this, especially knowing that not everyone learns English or Spanish. What is more, Spanish is not a simple language and has different dialects that should be considered before translating videos. The challenge here is the difficulty in finding translators and artists who can help you reach the goal.

English is the world’s first language in terms of popularity, and over 1.35 billion people know and speak it. However, the problem is that not everyone can speak and understand both languages (Spanish and English). That is why VidBy has joined the game. But firstly, you need to find out how to translate Spanish video to English.

How to translate from Spanish to English: The algorithm of work

The translation is done with the help of special software that has a unique algorithm. But before this algorithm starts to work, it is necessary to do a few actions.

The first action is to give the service a link to the video that is needed to be translated from Spanish to English or vice versa or simply upload the video. After that, you need to specify your order that the software can take into account while translating your videos. And finally, it is mandatory to pay for the video translation so that the algorithm can initiate the process.

When the algorithm makes the work done, it will inform you and give a link to the video. So, you know the answer to the question - how to translate a video from Spanish to English, so can easily handle it.

Additional features of the video translation services of VidBy

The auto process of translation is a great thing about VidBy, but a few more features can impress you, and you can take advantage of them.

Add a drop of emotions

Most software products, which translate Spanish video to English and vice versa, make translations accurate. However, these translations sound like monotonic speeches without having an emotional tone. VidBy translation service allows its customers to get translated videos with different emotions. At the current stage of development, it is possible to apply the translation of the following emotions:

  •     Anger;
  •     Joy;
  •     Fear;
  •     Disgust;
  •     Sadness;
  •     Surprise.

Of course, the list is short, but the development team has constantly worked on its expansion.

Speech synthesizer

The second remarkable feature of the VidBy video translator Spanish to English service is the feature of a speech synthesizer. Putting this term into simple words, the speech synthesizer means an artificial production of a human voice. It is possible to use the voice of a child, a teenager, an adult, or a senior. And this option adds a more realistic feeling to the translated video from Spanish to English and English to Spanish. 

What are the benefits of working with VidBy?

You see that VidBy puts a lot of effort into developing its translating services. Still, it is worth highlighting the benefits you get while using the video translation service from Spanish to English.

Quick translation results

Time always matters, and delivery time means a lot for the people who want to reach a global community. So, these people think about how to translate Spanish video to English faster. And the solution is right here - VidBy. It uses innovative technology, which is based on artificial intelligence, to make the translation from Spanish to English faster than other familiar services do.

This approach helps reduce the delivery time of the translated videos by thousands of times. You can get the final result in a short period of time (one minute of the video equals two minutes of awaiting). It is a short period because most services use a traditional translation approach and make work done in hours or even days. Consequently, you will save a lot of time and receive a high-quality video translation.

Guaranteed quality of the services

You probably have thoughts that artificial intelligence cannot make the translation from Spanish to English properly. But this assumption is wrong. Contemporary technologies have reached the point that they can compete with real people. And in the case of video and audio translation is the same story.

While using the services of VidBy, you will get the translated video faster and without losing the quality of translation. And if you do not believe in it, you can watch the samples on the official website. But what about the price of the services?

Low cost

The low cost of the VidBy video translator services is more advantageous to everyone who wants to translate Spanish video to English or vice versa. There is no need to hire professional artists and translators because artificial intelligence is the only responsible thing for all the processes of translation. And exact this moment allows you to save both time and your money.

A variety of subscriptions

For sure, there are people who are dealing with the need to translate videos from Spanish to English regularly. So, you can find three different subscriptions that have their own goals and benefit customers with specific needs.

For instance, the most advanced subscription of Professional is perfectly suitable for clients who need to translate Spanish videos to English with the application of different voices (up to 10 different voices). What is more, you can apply gender variations of the assigned voices and add some emotions to the videos.

An opportunity to edit

And the last moment to take advantage of is the opportunity to edit the translated transcripts. For sure, the accuracy of the translation is impressive, but you can always make some changes to it and perfect your videos.

How to translate Spanish video to English at VidBy

If you need to get a translated video from Spanish to English, but you do not know how to do this, it is highly advisable to use the services of VidBy.

At the very beginning, it is necessary to upload your video or give the video translator Spanish to English service a link to the video that should be translated from Spanish to English. After doing this, you will be asked to specify your request for the order. You need to choose the original language (Spanish), indicate its dialect, select the language you want to translate your video into (English), and decide which format of the video you wish to get in the end.

During the stage of the specification of the request, the service will automatically calculate and estimate the total price of the order, which should be paid. The service supports the most convenient payment solutions:

  •     Visa/Mastercard;
  •     ApplePay/GooglePay;
  •     PayPal;
  •     SWIFT transfers.

When the payment meets success, you will need to wait a certain time (depending on the length of the original video) and download the translated video from Spanish to English.

 

FAQ

  1. How to translate a Spanish video to English?

With the help of VidBy, it is not complicated to translate your Spanish video into English. It is necessary to go through a few steps to make the work done. Firstly, you will be asked to upload your video. After that, you need to specify the translation moments, like selecting the number of voices, their genders, etc. When the specification is behind, two steps remain - a payment and an awaiting time.

  1. How long does it take to translate a video from Spanish to English at VidBy?

Thanks to the work of the innovative algorithm that is based on artificial intelligence, you can translate any video from Spanish to English within a frame of 48 hours. And there is a subscription plan that allows accelerating this process to 24 hours.  While translating short videos, like a one-minute video, the process takes two minutes. The same principle applies to any video translation from Spanish to English - a one-minute fragment is translated in two minutes.

  1. What is the quality of translation from Spanish to English at VidBy?

Talking about the quality of video translation from Spanish to English and vice versa, it is worth noting that the final outcome will be almost the same as the traditional video translation approach, which involves professional translators and artists. So, there is no need to worry about it.

  1. Can I translate a video from Spanish to English in different voices?

Yes, you can translate your video from Spanish to English in up to 10 different voices. At the stage of the specification of your order, you need to select the number of voices that will be involved and specify the voices (male or female).
